interview.availability: Assigned at the discretion of the Admissions Committee
interview.impact: Absence of an interview will not adversely affect candidacy

selection_criteria.academic_accomplishment: High school academic record and achievements
selection_criteria.extracurricular_activities: Involvement and leadership in community and extracurricular activities
selection_criteria.personal_qualities: Strength of character, ability to overcome adversity, personal qualities and character
selection_criteria.additional_materials: Optional supplementary materials such as music recordings, artwork, or academic work

university_level.overview: We look forward to learning about you through your application. Here you'll find a detailed explanation of each admission application requirement.

GPA_requirement.guidelines: There is no specific GPA requirement mentioned.
GPA_requirement.general_requirement: Strong academic performance in high school

English_proficiency_requirements.guidelines: Not required for first-year and transfer applicants, but may be submitted if desired.

application_fee.overview: Application fee is $85, but fee waivers are available for students who demonstrate financial need.

application_materials.guidelines: Complete and submit your materials as soon as possible to ensure full and timely consideration of your application.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: Includes subsets of questions, an activities list, and a personal essay.

application_materials.material_name: Harvard College Questions for the Common Application or Coalition Application Harvard supplement
application_materials.guidelines: Complete the Harvard Questions with the application.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: Includes five required short-answer questions with 200-word limits each.

application_materials.guidelines: Includes a counselor letter and high school transcript.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: Submitted by school counselor or another school leader.

application_materials.guidelines: Ask two teachers in different academic subjects who know you well.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: Includes an evaluation form and a letter of recommendation.

application_materials.guidelines: Submitted by school counselor or other school official.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: Includes first semester grades of senior year.

application_materials.guidelines: Submit as soon as final grades become available, no later than July 1.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: Completed and sent by school counselor or other school official.

application_materials.guidelines: Harvard will accept the SAT or ACT to meet the standardized testing requirement.
application_materials.detailed_requirement: In exceptional cases, AP exam results, IB Actual or Predicted Scores, GCSE/A-Level Actual or Predicted Results, or National Leaving Exams Results or Predictions can meet the requirement.

other_requirements.detailed_requirement: Such as music recordings, artwork, or selected samples of academic work.

early_application.intro: Applying to Harvard under the Restrictive Early Action program empowers you to make a college choice early.
early_application.actions_after_admission: You do not have to commit to coming to Harvard, but you will learn earlier if it is an option for you.
